text: aur anaathon ko jaanchate raho, yahaan tak ki jab ve vivaah kee avastha ko pahunch jaen, to phir yadi tum dekho ki unamen soojh-boojh aa gaee hai, to unake maal unhen saump do, aur is bhay se ki kaheen ve bade na ho jaen tum unake maal anuchit roop se udaakar aur jaldee karake na khao. aur jo dhanavaan ho, use to (is maal se) se bachana hee chaahie. haan, jo nirdhan ho, vah uchit reeti se kuchh kha sakata hai. phir jab unake maal unhen saumpane lago, to unakee maujoodagee mein gavaah bana lo. hisaab lene ke lie allaah kaafee hai
